dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3031 : TSP Modernization Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES
form.official-title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for flexibility in making withdrawals from a Thrift Savings Plan account, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the TSP Modernization Act of 2017.

section.header: Thrift Savings Plan account withdrawal flexibility

subsection.text: Section 8433(c) of title 5, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking and who has not made a withdrawal under subsection (h)(1)(A) may make one withdrawal and inserting may make one or more withdrawals; and
by striking as a single payment and inserting in the same manner as a single payment is made; and

paragraph.text: by adding at the end the following:
Withdrawals under this subsection shall be subject to such other limitations or conditions as the Executive Director may prescribe by regulation.

subsection.header: Limitation on return of payment relating to a change in election
subsection.text: Section 8433(d) of title 5, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (1), by inserting , except that in the case of an election to receive an annuity, a former employee or Member may not change an election under this section on or after the date on which an annuity contract is purchased to provide for the annuity elected by the former employee or Member after this subchapter; and

subparagraph.text: by striking change an and inserting return a payment that was made pursuant to an; and
by striking on or after and all that follows through the former employee or Member.

subsection.header: Elimination of automatic annuity in absence of election
subsection.text: Section 8433(f) of title 5, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking (1) Notwithstanding and inserting Notwithstanding;
by striking this paragraph and inserting this subsection; and

subsection.header: Allowance of multiple age-Based in-Service withdrawals
subsection.text: Section 8433(h) of title 5, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: by redesignating paragraphs (3), (4), and (5) as paragraphs (2), (3), and (4), respectively; and
in paragraph (3), as so redesignated, by inserting limitations or before conditions.

subsection.text: Section 8432b(h)(2)(A) of title 5, United States Code, is amended by striking section 8433(d), or paragraph (1) or (2) of section 8433(h) and inserting subsection (d) or (f) of section 8433.

As soon as is practicable, as determined by the Executive Director of the Federal Retirement Thrift Investment Board, but not later than 2 years after the date of enactment of this Act, the Executive Director shall prescribe such regulations as are necessary to carry out the amendments made by this section.
The amendments made by this section shall take effect on the date on which the regulations prescribed under subsection (f) take effect.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives October 11, 2017.
